 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺ‎</span>] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַי‎</span> ***water***. 

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַי‎</span>]<sub>580</sub> **noun masculine**<sup>[[2Sam.14.14|2Sam 14:14]]</sup> only plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַ֫יִם‎</span> ==waters, water== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>23</sup> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ין‎</span>]<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>; [[BDB#SI|SI]]<sup>5</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎המים‎</span>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַיָּא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִּין‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***mû***</u></abbr>, plural ***mê***, also ***mâmu*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 394</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, plural <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Sabean [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מו‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מום‎</span> plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מון‎</span>, Minaean [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מה‎</span>], plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מהן‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>6th Or. Congr. (Leiden) ii. 1, 451 f.</sup> (see on these forms [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xiii.1888, 341 ff.</sup>)); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַ֫יִם‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָ֑יִם‎</span>) [[Gen.1.2|Gen 1:2]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמַּ֫יְמָה‎</span> [[Exod.7.15|Exod 7:15]]; [[Exod.8.16|Exod 8:16]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי‎</span> [[Gen.7.7|Gen 7:7]] + 71 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵי‎</span> [[Exod.4.9|Exod 4:9]] + 10 t. + [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] [[2Kgs.18.27|2Kgs 18:27]] = [[Isa.36.12|Isa 36:12]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימַי‎</span> [[Hos.2.7|Hos 2:7]] + [[1Sam.25.11|1Sam 25:11]] (but read here <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵינִי‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֶ֫יךָ‎</span> [[Exod.23.25|Exod 23:25]] + 3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימָיו‎</span> [[Num.20.8|Num 20:8]] + 6 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֶיהָ‎</span> [[Jer.6.7|Jer 6:7]]; [[Jer.50.38|Jer 50:38]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵינוּ‎</span> [[Lam.5.4|Lam 5:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Exod.7.19|Exod 7:19]] + 4 t.; — ***waters, water*** (c. adjective plural [[Gen.26.19|Gen 26:19]]; [[Exod.15.10|Exod 15:10]]; [[Lev.14.5|Lev 14:5]]; [[Lev.14.6|Lev 14:6]]; [[Lev.14.50|Lev 14:50]] + often, so always with adjective; also with plural participle [[Num.5.18|Num 5:18]]; [[Num.5.19|Num 5:19]]; [[Num.5.24|Num 5:24]]; [[2Kgs.3.20|2Kgs 3:20]] +; with plural pronoun [[Num.20.13|Num 20:13]]; [[Num.27.14|Num 27:14]]; [[2Kgs.2.21|2Kgs 2:21]] +; compare suffix [[Josh.4.18|Josh 4:18]] before plural verb [[Gen.1.9|Gen 1:9]]; [[Gen.1.20|Gen 1:20]]; [[Gen.1.21|Gen 1:21]]; [[Gen.7.17|Gen 7:17]] + often; after plural verb [[Josh.3.13|Josh 3:13]]; [[Isa.28.17|Isa 28:17]]; [[Prov.9.17|Prov 9:17]]; [[Ezek.31.4|Ezek 31:4]] +; rarely with singular verb; before, [[Gen.9.15|Gen 9:15]]; [[Lev.11.34|Lev 11:34]]; [[Num.20.2|Num 20:2]]; [[Num.24.7|Num 24:7]]; [[Num.33.14|Num 33:14]]; [[2Kgs.3.9|2Kgs 3:9]] after, [[Num.19.13|Num 19:13]]; [[Num.19.20|Num 19:20]]); — 

**1. a.** ***water*** of a spring or well (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַיִן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאֵר‎</span>) [[Gen.16.7|Gen 16:7]]; [[Gen.24.11|Gen 24:11]]; [[Gen.24.13|Gen 24:13]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.24.43|Gen 24:43]]; [[Exod.15.27|Exod 15:27]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.21.19|Gen 21:19]]; [[Gen.21.25|Gen 21:25]]; [[Num.20.17|Num 20:17]]; [[Num.21.16|Num 21:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), etc.; for drinking, also [[Amos.4.8|Amos 4:8]]; [[Amos.8.11|Amos 8:11]]; [[Jonah.3.7|Jonah 3:7]] + often; out of rock [[Exod.17.6|Exod 17:6]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Num.20.8|Num 20:8]] (twice in verse); [[Num.20.10|Num 20:10]]; [[Num.20.11|Num 20:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.8.15|Deut 8:15]] etc.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי מְרִיבָה‎</span> ([[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 165; 2nd ed. 181</sup>) [[Num.20.13|Num 20:13]]; [[Num.20.24|Num 20:24]]; [[Num.27.14|Num 27:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.33.8|Deut 33:8]]; [[Ps.81.8|Ps 81:8]]; [[Ps.106.32|Ps 106:32]] compare [[Deut.32.51|Deut 32:51]]; [[Ezek.47.19|Ezek 47:19]]; [[Ezek.48.28|Ezek 48:28]] for washing (hands, feet, person) [[Gen.18.4|Gen 18:4]]; [[Gen.24.32|Gen 24:32]]; [[Gen.43.24|Gen 43:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Kgs.3.11|2Kgs 3:11]]; [[Exod.29.4|Exod 29:4]]; [[Exod.30.20|Exod 30:20]]; [[Lev.15.5|Lev 15:5]]; [[Lev.15.6|Lev 15:6]] + ([[BDB#P|P]]); (victims) [[Lev.1.9|Lev 1:9]]; [[Lev.1.13|Lev 1:13]]; [[Lev.8.21|Lev 8:21]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); (vessels) [[Lev.6.21|Lev 6:21]]; [[Lev.12.32|Lev 12:32]]; [[Lev.12.34|Lev 12:34]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); (garments) [[Lev.15.17|Lev 15:17]]; [[Num.19.8|Num 19:8]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); for cooking [[Exod.12.9|Exod 12:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), compare [[Isa.64.1|Isa 64:1]]; [[Ezek.24.3|Ezek 24:3]] (symbolic); for purification [[Num.8.7|Num 8:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי חַטָּאת‎</span>) [[Num.19.9|Num 19:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי נִדָּה‎</span>), compare v[[Num.19.13|Num 19:13]] v[[Num.19.18|Num 19:18]] v[[Num.19.20|Num 19:20]] v[[Num.19.21|Num 19:21]] v[[Num.19.31|Num 19:31]]; [[Num.31.23|Num 31:23]] (twice in verse) (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ezek.36.25|Ezek 36:25]] (figurative). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of a river, Nile [[Exod.2.10|Exod 2:10]]; [[Exod.4.9|Exod 4:9]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Jer.2.18|Jer 2:18]] etc.; Jordan [[Josh.3.8|Josh 3:8]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), v[[Josh.3.15|Josh 3:15]] v[[Josh.3.16|Josh 3:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), etc.; Euphrates [[Isa.8.7|Isa 8:7]] (figurative), [[Jer.2.18|Jer 2:18]] Ezekiel's river [[Ezek.47.1|Ezek 47:1]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.47.2|Ezek 47:2]] +, etc.; of streams, canals, etc., especially, as condition of fertility [[Deut.8.7|Deut 8:7]]; [[Deut.10.7|Deut 10:7]]; [[Isa.1.30|Isa 1:30]]; [[Prov.30.16|Prov 30:16]]; [[2Kgs.3.17|2Kgs 3:17]] +, etc. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of sea [[Amos.5.8|Amos 5:8]]; [[Amos.9.6|Amos 9:6]] Red Sea [[Exod.15.8|Exod 15:8]]; [[Exod.15.10|Exod 15:10]]; [[Exod.15.19|Exod 15:19]] (song), [[Exod.14.21|Exod 14:21]]; [[Exod.14.22|Exod 14:22]]; [[Exod.14.26|Exod 14:26]] + ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Josh.2.10|Josh 2:10]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), etc. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** of flood [[Gen.7.7|Gen 7:7]]; [[Gen.7.10|Gen 7:10]]; [[Gen.8.3|Gen 8:3]]; [[Gen.8.7|Gen 8:7]]; [[Gen.8.8|Gen 8:8]]; [[Gen.8.9|Gen 8:9]]; [[Gen.8.11|Gen 8:11]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.6.17|Gen 6:17]]; [[Gen.7.6|Gen 7:6]]; [[Gen.7.17|Gen 7:17]]; [[Gen.7.18|Gen 7:18]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.7.19|Gen 7:19]]; [[Gen.8.5|Gen 8:5]]; [[Gen.9.11|Gen 9:11]]; [[Gen.9.15|Gen 9:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵינֹֿחַ‎</span> [[Isa.54.9|Isa 54:9]] (twice in verse) ***waters of Noah***. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** subterranean [[Exod.20.4|Exod 20:4]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.4.18|Deut 4:18]]; [[Deut.5.8|Deut 5:8]], compare [[Job.26.5|Job 26:5]]; [[Ps.136.6|Ps 136:6]]. **feminine** ==in clouds== [[Jer.10.13|Jer 10:13]]; [[Job.26.8|Job 26:8]]; [[Ps.29.3|Ps 29:3]] (twice in verse); [[Ps.104.3|Ps 104:3]]; [[Ps.148.4|Ps 148:4]], etc. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **g.** of rain [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]]; [[2Sam.21.10|2Sam 21:10]]; [[Deut.11.11|Deut 11:11]]; [[Ps.65.10|Ps 65:10]]; [[Job.5.10|Job 5:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָטָר‎</span>), etc. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **h.** of dew [[Judg.6.38|Judg 6:38]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **i.** primÊval deep [[Gen.1.2|Gen 1:2]]; [[Gen.1.6|Gen 1:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2.** with proper names, of location (q. v.), to denote springs, streams, or seas belonging to, near, such places: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵי מִצְרַיִם‎</span> [[Exod.7.19|Exod 7:19]]; [[Exod.8.2|Exod 8:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי מְרִיבָה‎</span> (see above **1 a**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי מֵרוֺם‎</span> [[Josh.11.5|Josh 11:5]]; [[Josh.11.7|Josh 11:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי עֵיןשֶֿׁמֶשׁ‎</span> [[Josh.15.7|Josh 15:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי נֶפְתּוֺחַ‎</span> [[Josh.15.9|Josh 15:9]]; [[Josh.18.15|Josh 18:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי יְרִיחוֺ‎</span> [[Josh.16.1|Josh 16:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי מְגִּדּוֺ‎</span> [[Judg.5.19|Judg 5:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי נִמְרִ(י)ם‎</span> [[Isa.15.6|Isa 15:6]]; [[Jer.48.34|Jer 48:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי דִימוֺן‎</span> [[Isa.15.9|Isa 15:9]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי הַשִּׁלֹּחַ‎</span> [[Isa.8.6|Isa 8:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵי גִּיחוֺן הָעֶלְיוֺן‎</span> [[2Chr.32.30|2Chr 32:30]] compare also proper name, of a location <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׂרְפוֺת מַיִם‎</span> [[Josh.11.8|Josh 11:8]]; [[Josh.13.6|Josh 13:6]]. 

**3.** special uses are: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי רַגְלַיִם‎</span> ***water of the feet*** = urine [[2Kgs.18.27|2Kgs 18:27]] = [[Isa.36.12|Isa 36:12]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַדְמֵנָה בְּמֵי‎</span> [[Isa.25.10|Isa 25:10]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ***in water of a dunghill*** (&gt; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמוֺ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם לַחַץ‎</span> ***water*** (which is) ***distress***, because drunk in imprisonment [[1Kgs.22.27|1Kgs 22:27]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם לַחַץ‎</span>) = [[2Chr.18.26|2Chr 18:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמֵישָֿׁ֑לֶג‎</span> ***in snow-water*** [[Job.9.30|Job 9:30]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎במו‎</span>; [[BDB#Me|Me]] [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּמוֺ‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵי שֶׁלֶג‎</span> [[Job.24.19|Job 24:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם קְדשִׁים‎</span> [[Num.5.17|Num 5:17]] ***holy water*** (compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem.165, 2nd ed.181</sup>, but text dubious, see [[BDB#Di|Di]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי הַמָּרִים‎</span> ***bitter water*** [[Num.5.18|Num 5:18]]; [[Num.5.19|Num 5:19]]; [[Num.5.23|Num 5:23]]; [[Num.5.24|Num 5:24]] compare [[Exod.15.23|Exod 15:23]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי מָרִים הֵם‎</span>), opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְתְּקוּ הַמַּיִם‎</span> v[[Exod.15.25|Exod 15:25]] ***and the waters were sweetened***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי חַטָּאת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי נִדָּה‎</span> see above **1 a**; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם חַיִּים‎</span> ***living*** (i.e. running) ***water*** [[Lev.14.5|Lev 14:5]]; [[Lev.14.6|Lev 14:6]]; [[Lev.14.50|Lev 14:50]]; [[Lev.14.51|Lev 14:51]]; [[Lev.14.52|Lev 14:52]]; [[Num.19.17|Num 19:17]], also (figurative) [[Zech.14.8|Zech 14:8]] (compare [[Ezek.47|Ezek 47]]), and (figurative) [[Jer.2.13|Jer 2:13]]; [[Jer.17.13|Jer 17:13]]. See also below (compare [[Num.21.17|Num 21:17]]; [[Num.21.18|Num 21:18]] see [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem.i.127.157; 2nd ed.135,176</sup>). 

**4.** among figurative uses are: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of distress [[Isa.43.2|Isa 43:2]]; [[Ps.66.12|Ps 66:12]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ‎</span>), [[Ps.69.2|Ps 69:2]]; [[Lam.3.54|Lam 3:54]] usually ***many waters*** [[2Sam.22.17|2Sam 22:17]] = [[Ps.18.17|Ps 18:17]], compare [[Job.22.11|Job 22:11]]; [[Ps.32.6|Ps 32:6]]; [[Ps.144.7|Ps 144:7]], or ***deep waters*** [[Ps.69.3|Ps 69:3]]; [[Ps.69.15|Ps 69:15]], compare v[[Ps.69.16|Ps 69:16]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵירֿאֹשׁ‎</span> ***water of gall*** [[Jer.8.14|Jer 8:14]]; [[Jer.9.14|Jer 9:14]]; [[Jer.23.15|Jer 23:15]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרֶץ מַיִם‎</span> [[2Sam.5.20|2Sam 5:20]] = [[1Chr.14.11|1Chr 14:11]] of outbursting force. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם שְׁאוֺן‎</span> [[Isa.17.12|Isa 17:12]]; [[Isa.17.13|Isa 17:13]] of rushing nations. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** of what is impetuous, violent, overwhelming [[Isa.28.2|Isa 28:2]]; [[Isa.28.17|Isa 28:17]]; [[Hos.10.7|Hos 10:7]]; [[Job.27.20|Job 27:20]]; [[Ps.124.4|Ps 124:4]]; [[Ps.124.5|Ps 124:5]]; [[Ps.88.18|Ps 88:18]] simileof impetuousness <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּחַז כַּמַּיִ ם‎</span> [[Gen.49.4|Gen 49:4]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** (as running away) of heart in timidity [[Josh.7.5|Josh 7:5]], compare [[Ps.22.16|Ps 22:16]], of knees [[Ezek.7.17|Ezek 7:17]]; [[Ezek.21.12|Ezek 21:12]]. **feminine** ==of transitoriness== [[Job.11.16|Job 11:16]]; [[Job.24.18|Job 24:18]]; [[Ps.58.8|Ps 58:8]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **g.** of refreshment [[Isa.32.2|Isa 32:2]]; [[Isa.49.10|Isa 49:10]] spiritual [[Isa.12.3|Isa 12:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **h.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי מְנֻחוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.23.2|Ps 23:2]] in figure of rest and peace, compare [[Jer.31.9|Jer 31:9]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **i.** of reckless bloodshed (poured out like water) [[Ps.79.3|Ps 79:3]] compare pouring away (and not eating) blood [[Deut.12.16|Deut 12:16]]; [[Deut.12.24|Deut 12:24]]; [[Deut.15.23|Deut 15:23]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **j.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאֵר מַיִם חַיִּים‎</span> [[Song.4.15|Song 4:15]] figurative of bride; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם מִבּוֺרֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Prov.5.15|Prov 5:15]] of enjoyment of one's own wife; of harlotry <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם גְּנוּבִים‎</span> [[Prov.9.17|Prov 9:17]] ***stolen waters.*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **k.** of outpoured wrath of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Hos.5.10|Hos 5:10]]. 

**1.** of abundant justice [[Amos.5.24|Amos 5:24]] **masculine** ==of outpoured feelings== [[Job.3.24|Job 3:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁפְכִי כַמַּיִם לִבֵךְ‎</span> [[Lam.2.19|Lam 2:19]]. — [[Isa.48.1|Isa 48:1]] read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמְּעֵי‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמֵּי‎</span>, so Secker [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt Skinner</sup>, compare [[BDB#Di|Di]].
